name: CoinAbcCommon
brief: Common definitions for ABC (A Better Coin) optimized simplex

algorithms.name:
ABC SIMD Foundation (Types, Tolerances, IEEE Zero Tests)
Core type definitions and macros for the FasterCoin 2012 SIMD-optimized
simplex implementation. Provides:
- Type aliases: CoinSimplexDouble, CoinSimplexInt
- Compiler-specific forced inlining (ABC_INLINE)
- Parallelism control: ABC_PARALLEL (0=none, 1=pthreads, 2=Cilk)
- LAPACK integration options (ABC_USE_LAPACK, ABC_DENSE_CODE)
- Low-level zero testing macros using IEEE 754 bit patterns
- AbcTolerancesEtc class for algorithm tolerance parameters

see: AbcSimplex for the main ABC simplex implementation
